The type of the entity's identifier.

member.name: T:MCA.SharedKernel.Infrastructure.Repositories.ReadOnlyEfRepository`3
member.summary: Base abstract read-only repository implementation using EF Core.

member.name: F:MCA.SharedKernel.Infrastructure.Repositories.ReadOnlyEfRepository`3._dbSet
member.summary: s

member.name: M:MCA.SharedKernel.Infrastructure.Repositories.ReadOnlyEfRepository`3.PrepareQuery(System.Linq.IQueryable{`1})
member.summary: Virtual method to prepare query with includes and other modifications. Uses enableTracking field to conditionally apply AsNoTracking. Override this method in derived repositories to add includes, filters, etc.
member.returns: The prepared query with modifications

member.name: M:MCA.SharedKernel.Infrastructure.Repositories.ReadOnlyEfRepository`3.GetPaginatedAsync(MCA.SharedKernel.Domain.Contracts.Specifications.IPaginatedSpecification{`1},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns a paginated result based on the provided pagination specification. Applies the specification filters first, then computes total count and returns the requested page.
member.param: Pagination specification including filters and pagination parameters

member.name: M:MCA.SharedKernel.Infrastructure.Repositories.ReadOnlyEfRepository`3.GetPaginatedAsync(MCA.SharedKernel.Domain.Contracts.Specifications.IPaginatedSortableSpecification{`1},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns a paginated result applying optional sorting from the specification. If does not provide a sort selector, falls back to Id ordering for stability.

member.name: T:MCA.SharedKernel.Infrastructure.Repositories.EfRepository`3
member.summary: Full EF Core repository supporting write operations, inherits read-only repo.

member.summary: Adds an entity to the repository

member.summary: Deletes multiple entities from the repository

member.name: M:MCA.SharedKernel.Infrastructure.Repositories.EfRepository`3.BulkDeleteAsync(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{`1,System.Boolean}},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Bulk delete entities that match the specified condition using ExecuteDeleteAsync This is more efficient than loading entities into memory and then deleting them
member.param: Condition to match entities for deletion
member.returns: Number of entities deleted
